Orlandos Walt Disney World Resort has emerged as the clear frontrunner to host the league if the season resumes.
The COVID-19 pandemic shut the NBA down on March 11.
The Athletic reported on Wednesday NBA teams could be fully training in mid-June and playin… [+2948 chars]

articles.content: The Detroit Lions Fan Report Twitter account recently shared a photo of quarterback Matthew Stafford working out with rookie running back DAndre Swift. The account posted another image featuring fellow running back Johnson posing on the beach with girlfriend … [+1759 chars]

articles.author: Martin Smith
articles.title: Cummins wants other options following saliva ban - cricket.com.au
articles.description: Fast bowlers 'have to have another option' if saliva is banned from being used on the ball, according to Australia's star quick
articles.content:
Australia’s pace spearhead Pat Cummins has urged cricket's lawmakers to sanction the use of an artificial substance to shine the ball during the COVID-19 pandemic now that saliva looks set to be banned.
The ICC's Cricket Committee this week proposed a prohib… [+4265 chars]

articles.author: Marc Churches
articles.title: Sharks Shaun Johnson backs Paul Gallen for NRL comeback - Wide World of Sports
articles.description: 'He'd be fine, I've got no doubt in the world'
articles.content:
Cronulla Sharks five-eighth Shaun Johnson has backed former teammate Paul Gallen to make a successful return to rugby league should the Warriors take up his offer.
Gallen, 39, retired from the NRL last year after playing 348 first-grade games for the Sharks.… [+1715 chars]

articles.description: Want to hear the referees' side of the story in their bitter dispute with Peter V'landys and the NRL? It is not a pretty one.
articles.content:
The problem, of course, is that when you are dealing with real lives, and professional lives at that, it is surely fair to hear the refs' side of the story?
It is not a pretty one.
